items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

items.name: Calamari
items.description: Crispy fried squid served with marinara sauce.

items.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
items.description: Creamy spinach and artichoke dip served with tortilla chips.

items.name: Buffalo Wings
items.description: Spicy buffalo wings served with celery and blue cheese dressing.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with roasted vegetables.

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella.

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.description: 12oz ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with mashed potatoes and asparagus.

items.name: Vegetable Pasta
items.description: Penne pasta tossed with seasonal vegetables in a light garlic and olive oil sauce.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy New York-style cheesecake served with a berry compote.

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.description: Rich custard topped with a layer of hard caramel.

items.name: Craft Beer
items.description: Rotating selection of local craft beers.

items.name: Classic Mojito
items.description: Refreshing cocktail with rum, mint, lime, and soda water.

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.description: Homemade lemonade with fresh lemons and a hint of mint.
